mapper.sql: select pgo.overview_id, pgo.dept_id, pgo.user_id, pgo.project_id, pgo.gather_date, pgo.total_score, pgo.gather_status, pgo.gather_id, pgo.audit_id, pgo.audit_time, pgo.create_by, pgo.create_time, pgo.update_by, pgo.update_time, pgo.remark, vp.post_name post_name, u.user_name user_name, d.dept_name dept_name from perf_gather_overview pgo left join perf_ind_project pip on pgo.project_id = pip.project_id left join sys_user u on pgo.user_id = u.user_id left join sys_dept d on pgo.dept_id = d.dept_id left join vip_post vp on pip.post_id = vp.post_id
mapper.select: SELECT pgo.user_id, MAX(u.user_name) AS user_name, MAX(pgo.dept_id) AS dept_id, MAX(d.dept_name) AS dept_name, SUM(pgo.total_score) AS score FROM perf_gather_overview pgo LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON pgo.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON pgo.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE pgo.gather_date >= #{startDate} AND pgo.gather_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY pgo.user_id ORDER BY score DESC, pgo.user_id ASC LIMIT #{topN}

SELECT pgo.gather_date, AVG(pgo.total_score) AS avg_score FROM perf_gather_overview pgo WHERE pgo.gather_date >= #{startDate} AND pgo.gather_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY pgo.gather_date ORDER BY pgo.gather_date

SELECT pgo.dept_id, MAX(d.dept_name) AS dept_name, AVG(pgo.total_score) AS dept_avg FROM perf_gather_overview pgo LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON pgo.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE pgo.gather_date >= #{startDate} AND pgo.gather_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY pgo.dept_id ORDER BY dept_avg DESC, pgo.dept_id ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT pgd.category_id, MAX(c.category_name) AS category_name, SUM( CASE pgd.score_type WHEN 1 THEN IFNULL(pgd.item_score, 0) WHEN 2 THEN -IFNULL(pgd.item_score, 0) ELSE 0 END ) AS score FROM perf_gather_detail pgd LEFT JOIN perf_ind_category c ON pgd.category_id = c.category_id WHERE pgd.gather_date >= #{startDate} AND pgd.gather_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY pgd.category_id ORDER BY pgd.category_id
